tools.name: create_task
tools.description: Create a new task for an agent to execute in the CodeTether system. Use this when the user wants to create and assign a new task to be worked on.

title.description: The title or name of the task to be created

description.description: A detailed description of what the task involves and what needs to be accomplished
examples: The login button doesn't redirect users after successful authentication
Add OAuth2 support for Google and GitHub login

codebase_id.description: The ID of the codebase to associate with this task. If not specified, defaults to 'global'

agent_type.description: The type of agent to handle this task. build agents execute code tasks, plan agents create plans, explore agents investigate codebases

priority.description: The priority level of the task (0-10, where 10 is highest priority). Higher priority tasks are processed first

tools.name: list_tasks
tools.description: List tasks in the CodeTether system with optional filtering by status or codebase. Use this to show the user what tasks exist.

status.description: Filter tasks by their status. Common statuses include: pending (not started), running (currently being worked on), completed (finished successfully), failed (encountered errors), cancelled (stopped by user)

codebase_id.description: Filter tasks to only show those associated with a specific codebase ID

tools.name: get_task
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific task by its ID. Use this when the user asks about a particular task and provides a task ID.

task_id.description: The unique identifier of the task to retrieve details for

tools.name: cancel_task
tools.description: Cancel a running or pending task. Use this when the user wants to stop a task that is currently in progress or waiting to be processed.

task_id.description: The unique identifier of the task to cancel

tools.name: get_session_history
tools.description: Retrieve the message history for a specific session. Use this when the user wants to review what happened in a previous conversation session.

session_id.description: The unique identifier of the session to retrieve history for

tools.name: playback_session
tools.description: Play back a session verbatim or as a summary. Use this when the user wants to replay or review a previous conversation session.

session_id.description: The unique identifier of the session to playback

style.description: The playback style: verbatim plays back every message exactly as-is, summary provides a condensed version with key points

tools.name: discover_agents
tools.description: Discover available CodeTether agents that can be messaged or assigned tasks. Use this to show the user what agents are available in the system.

tools.name: send_message
tools.description: Send a message to a specific CodeTether agent. Use this for agent-to-agent communication or when the user explicitly wants to message an agent.

agent_name.description: The name of the agent to send the message to

message.description: The message content to send to the agent
examples: Start working on the refactoring task
